remarks: Lemma for ~ abelth .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)
statement:
abelth.1 $e |- ( ph -> A : NN0 --> CC ) $.
abelth.2 $e |- ( ph -> seq 0 ( + , A ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
abelth.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. RR ) $.
abelth.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ M ) $.
abelth.5 $e |- S = { z e. CC | ( abs ` ( 1 - z ) ) <_ ( M x. ( 1 - ( abs ` z ) ) ) } $.
abelthlem3 $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> seq 0 ( + , ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( A ` n ) x. ( X ^ n ) ) ) ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
$d A n z $.
$d M n z $.
$d S n $.
$d X n z $.
$d n ph $.
